explains: n. 病毒；病毒性疾病，病毒感染；（计算机）病毒，（手机的）短信病毒；有害影响，毒害；<古>毒液
wordGroup: hepatitis b virus 乙型肝炎病毒；[病毒学]B型肝炎病毒
flu virus [医学]流感病毒；禽流感病毒
human immunodeficiency virus 人体免疫缺损病毒（即艾滋病毒HIV）
herpes simplex virus 单纯性疱疹病毒
avian influenza virus 禽流感病毒
newcastle disease virus 新城鸡瘟病毒
influenza a virus 甲型流感病毒
respiratory syncytial virus 呼吸道合胞体病毒
human papilloma virus 人乳头状瘤病毒

sentences.en: There's a virus going around the office.
sentences.cn: 办公室里流行着一种病毒性疾病。

sentences.en: The virus seems to have attacked his throat.
sentences.cn: 病毒似乎已侵害到他的咽喉。

sentences.en: Her heart was irreparably damaged by a virus.
sentences.cn: 她的心脏被某种病毒不可补救地损伤了。
